meanings.definition: Change or cause to change in form, character, or function
meanings.sent1: She converts the old shed into a cozy reading nook.
meanings.sent2: He converts sunlight into electricity using solar panels.
meanings.sent3: The magician converts a hat into a rabbit, much to the audience's delight.
meanings.sent4: Time converts memories into stories we tell ourselves.
meanings.sent5: The artist converts emotions into beautiful paintings that touch the soul.

meanings.definition: A person who has been persuaded to change their religious faith or other beliefs
meanings.sent1: My friend Sarah is a recent convert to Buddhism.
meanings.sent2: The preacher welcomed the new convert with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The convert joked that they used to be a 'non-believer' in coffee until they tried a latte.
meanings.sent4: She was a convert to the idea of meditation after experiencing its calming effects.
meanings.sent5: The convert found solace in their new beliefs, feeling a sense of peace.

meanings.definition: A person who has been converted to another purpose or use
meanings.sent1: The old factory was now a convert into a trendy art gallery.
meanings.sent2: He was a convert of his garage into a home gym.
meanings.sent3: The convert of the spare room into a home office made working from home much more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The backyard shed was a convert into a cozy guest cottage for visitors.
meanings.sent5: The convert of the abandoned building into a community center brought new life to the neighborhood.
